List.Notes:
Work In Progress for Test 1.1.x patch 9
- dog movement: jittery movement is fixed and overall shortest route optimizations
- dog movement is now grid/tile based instead of using screen pixel coordinates
- camera follow is now smart(ish) and tries to move ahead of the dog when dog is running longer in one direction
